root.name: ESPN MLS ExtraTime
root.description: ReceptionMLS ExtraTime was released to very positive reviews, receiving an 8.2 from IGN, and an 85 from Digital Sports. Reviewers likened the game to the much-superior Winning Eleven 5, and liked the games realism compared the much more arcade-style gameplay of FIFA.DeathDespite its only iteration having generally positive reviews, MLS ExtraTime was limited to only one release, as the MLS licensed its players and uniforms to EA Sports' FIFA series.
